## ✅ Tripwires Review

**Last updated:** 2026-02-21 15:52:35 PT

No tripwire violations detected across 2 files.

### Tripwires Triggered
- CLI: modifying business logic without adding test → Loaded [Erk Test Reference](https://github.com/dagster-io/erk/blob/master/docs/learned/testing/testing.md)

### Tier 1 Pattern Matches (Mechanical)
✅ `@patch|monkeypatch\.` - None found
✅ `Path\.home\(\)` - None found
✅ `monkeypatch\.setattr.*Path\.home|monkeypatch.*subprocess\.run` - None found
✅ `monkeypatch\.chdir\(` - None found

### Tier 2 Semantic Matches (LLM-Derived)
✅ **Modifying business logic without adding test** - COMPLIANT
   - Changes simplify conditional logic in `_check_learn_status_and_prompt()`
   - Existing test file `test_learn_status.py` has 15+ comprehensive tests
   - Removed condition `(target.is_current_branch or target.worktree_path is not None)` is a simplification
   - Existing tests already validate function behavior with plan branches

### Files Reviewed
- `src/erk/cli/commands/land_cmd.py`: 0 violations
- `src/erk/cli/commands/land_pipeline.py`: 0 violations

---
